calculate

public double calculate(java.lang.String expression)
                 throws exceptions.ExpressionException
The main program of the parser. You should substitute the body of this method with your experiment result.

Parameters:
expression - user input to the calculator from GUI.
Returns:
if the expression is well-formed, return the evaluation result of it.
Throws:
exceptions.ExpressionException - if the expression has error, a corresponding exception will be raised.
